info.author: Mario Ruggier
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Academic Free License (AFL)
info.description:
Evoque is a lightweight full-featured generic text templating engine for python
with sandbox-ability, versatility and simplicity as key feature priorities.
Plus: no source file format constraints; internal processing is exclusively in
unicode; dynamic template inheritance; very simple way for templates to address,
call and transfer evaluation context; template managed in collections, each with
own settings; small footprint, with less than 1K SLOC; extremely fast.

Evoque may be used stand-alone just as well as within any web application
framework, such as Pylons_, Django_, QP_. 

.. _Pylons: http://www.pylonshq.com/
.. _Django: http://www.djangoproject.com/
.. _QP: http://www.mems-exchange.org/software/qp/
info.keywords: text html xml template templating eval restricted sandbox
info.name: evoque
info.html_description:
Evoque is a lightweight full-featured generic text templating engine for python with sandbox-ability, versatility and simplicity as key feature priorities. Plus: no source file format constraints; internal processing is exclusively in unicode; dynamic template inheritance; very simple way for templates to address, call and transfer evaluation context; template managed in collections, each with own settings; small footprint, with less than 1K SLOC; extremely fast.

Evoque may be used stand-alone just as well as within any web application framework, such as Pylons, Django, QP.
